snippet: Woody Johnson, the owner of the Jets, said that he was “extremely happy” to have Geno Smith on his team and that he looked forward to a “fun” quarterback competition.
abstract: New York Jets owner Woody Johnson says that he is happy to have Geno Smith on his team and that he looks forward to quarterback competition.
lead_paragraph: Woody Johnson, the owner of the Jets, said that he was “extremely happy” to have Geno Smith on his team and that he looked forward to a “fun” quarterback competition.
